Text: Managing Energy Price RiskSecond EditionVince I just wanted to thank you for supplying a copy of the book The article on the natural gas market is just what Ive been looking for The new addition coupled with the first versions discussion of the volatility of the gas market in the mid s should be very helpful in convincing these government watchdog types that basis adjustments in pricing formulas are not some sinister plot to deprive the feds of their royalties Or should if there is any rationality in government Thanks again for your help Best regards Steve Williams EOG Resources
